text: addehattinre janatayile ahankarikalaya pramanimar avarile durbalareat athava avarile visvasiccavareat ceadiccu: "svalih tanre nathan niyeagicca dutan tanneyanenn ninnalkkurappuntea?â€ avar ariyiccu: "addeham nannalilekku vannat etearu sandesavumayanea atil visvasiccavaran nannal; sansayamilla.â€
